short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR codes from text input shown in a popup with history. The QR code can be downloaded as an image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of quick and easy QR code creation with the "Simple QR Generator", a minimalist Chrome extension crafted for convenience and speed. This tool is perfect for users looking to seamlessly convert text into QR codes without any fuss.

Key Features:

- Effortless QR Code Generation: Enter text, and instantly see it transformed into a QR code, right in your browserâ€™s popup.
- Convenient History Access: Never lose track of your past activity with an easy-to-navigate history feature that keeps your generated QR codes at your fingertips.
- One-Click Download: Save your QR codes as images with a single click, making it easy to print, share, or store them for future use.

Ideal for professionals, educators, or anyone in need of generating and managing QR codes easily, the Simple QR Generator streamlines your digital tasks with its straightforward interface. Enhance your productivity and simplify your digital interactions with this essential tool.
